links.description: Nahid is resting on a bench outside a Target clothing store, her groceries beside her. links.title: Rare Tesla Model S fire following fatal crash in speeding accident
links.description: Cars catch on fire after severe high-speed impacts. That's nothing new to Tesla or electric vehicles, but there's also no doubt that battery fires are different from gas-powered car fires. The latest example comes from a tragic fatal accident in Indianapolis early this morning.

links.title: Here Are a Few of Tesla CEO Elon Musk's Mind Blowing Ideas
links.description: Tesla ( TSLA) CEO Elon Musk is a visionary, known for his ideas that push the boundaries of technology. That's illustrated in Tesla's stock price, which jumped 59% over the past 12 months, topping the broad S&P 500's 22% increase. From space travel to self-driving cars, Musk is showing no signs of slowing down.

links.description: Tesla Motors raised $226.1 million dollars in an initial public offering Tuesday, and its shares surged 41 percent as investors snapped up stock in a Silicon Valley company that, for all its buzz, has posted a profit just once.
